vulnerability.name: USN-4622-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4622-1 fixed a vulnerability in OpenLDAP. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that OpenLDAP incorrectly handled certain network  packets. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause OpenLDAP to crash,  resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: OpenLDAP could be made to crash or run programs if it received specially crafted network traffic. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
